author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERICK FORECAST TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY... ...HURRICANE WARNINGS ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE OAXACA COAST...
summary: ...ERICK FORECAST TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY... ...HURRICANE WARNINGS ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE OAXACA COAST... As of 9:00 AM CST Tue Jun 17 the center of Erick was located near 12.3, -94.1 with movement WNW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Erick (EP5/EP052025)
